author: jvanzyl
msg: We will just append ".java" as there is no real access to the original
suffix but this is for indexing java sources so I can live with the
hardcoded ".java" until this thing is rewritten using the java parser.

author: kaz
msg: - Added the <issueTrackingUrl> to the project descriptor.  This is used
to provide a link in the navigation bar to a project's issue tracking
- Also changed <homepage> element to <url> per Dan's suggestion.
